title: Keycloak 23.0.7 released
content: To download the release go to .   UPGRADING  Before upgrading refer to for a complete list of changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   ENHANCEMENTS   * Shorter lifespan for offline session cache entries in memory storage   BUGS   * Localization: Admin UI doesn't pick up message bundles from realms other than    master admin/ui  * Failure: FipsDistTest ci  * Kerberos principal attribute not found on LDAP user - even if kerberos    authentication is off ldap  * ldap-group-mapper fails when empty member: attribute is present ldap  * LDAP federation reports "Creating new LDAP Store..." on every login ldap  * Native SQL Schema names broken on MySQL storage  * Workflow failure: Quarkus IT -    FipsDistTest#testUnsupportedHttpsPkcs12KeyStoreInStrictMode ci  * Workflow failure: Quarkus IT -    FipsDistTest#testUnsupportedHttpsPkcs12KeyStoreInStrictMode ci  * Freemarker erroneously escapes/sanitizes URL in template.ftl (&) login/ui  * Microsoft social login failure testsuite
